item.title: I'm Born!
item.description: About two years ago, I was in a job I wasn’t particularly interested in, in a work environment that left me a nervous wreck at all times. To further up the ante, I realized that I was turning 30 soon and that time was growing thin for me to make a major push towards the career and life I wanted.1 A visual representation, as rendered in Bitsy, of a good portion of my old job.
